TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbFactory extends System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbFactory Inherits DbProviderFactory
public ref class OleDbFactory sealed : System::Data::Common::DbProviderFactory

summary.span: Stellt eine Gruppe von Methoden für das Erstellen von Instanzen der Datenquellenklassen-Implementierung des OLEDB-Anbieters dar.

span.span: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of the OLEDB provider's implementation of the data source classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateCommand () As DbCommand
public: override System::Data::Common::DbCommand ^ CreateCommand();

remarks.format: ## Examples Das folgende Codefragment gibt einen stark typisierten Instanz:The following code fragment returns a strongly-typed instance: ```vb Dim newFactory As OleDbFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance Dim cmd As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ``` ```csharp OleDbFactory newFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance; DbCommand cmd = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```

summary.span: Diese kann zum Abrufen von stark typisierten Datenobjekten verwendet werden.

span.span: This can be used to retrieve strongly-typed data objects.

remarks.format: ## Examples Das folgende Codefragment verwendet die Feld zum Abrufen einer Serverinstanz aus, und klicken Sie dann zurück einen stark typisierten Instanz:The following code fragment uses the field to retrieve an instance, and then return a strongly-typed instance: ```vb Dim newFactory As OleDbFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance Dim cmd As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ``` ```csharp OleDbFactory newFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance; DbCommand cmd = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```
